casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON TRUST COMPANY, N.A., f/k/a the Bank of New York Trust Company, N.A., as Trustee FOR CHASE MORTGAGE FINANCE TRUST MULTI-CLASS MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES SERIES 2007-S2, Appellant,
v.
Ashok R. PATEL a/k/a Ashok Patel; Ushaben A. Patel a/k/a Ushaben Patel; JP Morgan Chase Bank, National Association; Rotunda West Association, Inc., Appellees. Case No. 2D16-5480 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 22, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
